title: STEPHEN KINGS - CUJO.1983.PAL.DVDR.SUBS[EN.FI.SV.NL.ES] -Lindoff
description:
Description
The frightening story of a huge dog that becomes a rabid monster 
after being bitten by a bat. Based on the novel by Stephen King.

Special Features
Moving Menus, Photo Gallery, Stephen King Filmography
